content: 2018 Singaporean TV series or program ***Gifted*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 天之骄子) is a Singaporean drama produced by Mediacorp Studios Malaysia and telecast on [Mediacorp Channel 8](/wiki/Channel_8_(Singapore)). The show is currently airing at 9pm on weekdays and has a repeat telecast at 8am the following day. The series consists of 20 episodes. ## Cast - [Elvin Ng](/wiki/Elvin_Ng) as Guan Yaozu 关耀祖 - [Zhang Yaodong](/wiki/Zhang_Yaodong) as Li Xiaoyi 李孝义 - [Tong Bing Yu](/wiki/Tong_Bing_Yu) as Su Lingli 苏伶俐 - [Dawn Yeoh](/wiki/Dawn_Yeoh) as He Lulu 何露露 - [Michelle Chia](/wiki/Michelle_Chia) as Yao Liqian 姚丽倩 - [Patrick Lee](/wiki/Patrick_Lee_(actor)) as Guan Dezhi 关得志 - [Frederick Lee](/wiki/Frederick_Lee_(actor)) as Liao Weihao 廖伟豪 - [Fiona Xie](/wiki/Fiona_Xie) as Ma Xinrou 马心柔 - [Teddy Tang](/wiki/Teddy_Tang) as Zhao Qikang 赵启康 - [Hong Huifang](/wiki/Hong_Huifang) as Hu Jinmei 胡锦梅 - [Chen Xiuhuan](/wiki/Chen_Xiuhuan) as Luo Yali 罗雅丽 - [Bernard Tan](/wiki/Bernard_Tan_(actor)) as Zhao Donghao 赵洞豪 - Zhang Wei 张为 as Grandpa Luo 罗爷爷 - Jeffrey Chong 庄惟翔 as Ma Dongliang 马栋梁 - [Hu Wensui](/wiki/Hu_Wensui) ## Original Sound Tracks Song titleSong TypeSinger烽火Theme songDesmond Ng幸福不同步Ending themeJyin Poh - [List of programmes broadcast by Mediacorp Channel 8](/wiki/List_of_programmes_broadcast_by_Mediacorp_Channel_8) This article about media in Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Gifted (Singaporean TV series)
